content:
That's great to hear! Codenames is an excellent game for team-building and bonding, and it's awesome that you introduced it to your coworkers during your lunch break. Winning both rounds is definitely something to celebrate!

Taboo is an excellent choice for your game night, and it's a great icebreaker game that's perfect for a large group. It's easy to learn, and the gameplay is fast-paced and engaging. I'm sure your coworkers will have a blast playing together and laughing at each other's creative descriptions.

As an added tip, consider setting up a few rules or challenges to make the game more interesting. For example, you could have a "speed round" where players have to describe the word as quickly as possible, or a "theme round" where all the words are related to a specific topic, like movies or music. This can add an extra layer of fun and excitement to the game.

Remember to have plenty of snacks and drinks available to keep everyone energized and focused throughout the game night. And don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more game recommendations or tips in the future!
